text: chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha tae anaknea chea anakchuoy sangkroh puok anak pi pheap ngngut( kroh m h nd reay)nowleukok ning samoutr khn del puok anak kampoung buongsuong som pi trong daoy aonlomton ning sngatsngiem tha chea karpit nasa brasenbae trong ban chuoy sangkroh puok yeung aoy ruochphot pi kroh m h nd reay teangnih puok yeung pitchea nung klaytowchea anak doengkoun noh
